I just saw this and couldn't stop chucking :)

That said, watching your SSG dance the last year has been fun and really helpful for me :)

content.html: You obviously have far, far better self-control than I. :-) That said: when I was using Hugo, I left my templates pretty much alone ‚Äî although, honestly, it was because I was afraid to mess with the Go code all that much.
content.text: You obviously have far, far better self-control than I. :-) That said: when I was using Hugo, I left my templates pretty much alone ‚Äî although, honestly, it was because I was afraid to mess with the Go code all that much.

content.html: I certainly understand the temptation, but I've not even changed my @GoHugoIO theme once since I started that site.
